Export.Routine: INRAHMENGROUP ;INRAHMENGROUP;TYBD;KOPIE DER ZAHLUNGSKONDITION AUS LIEFERANTENSTAMM IN WG STAMM;11.10.2000 ; Compiled February 16, 2005 10:53:32 ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| KOPIE DER ZAHLUNGSKONDITION AUS LIEFERANTENSTAMM IN WG STAMM ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| ;| TYBD 11.10.2000 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; ; IF $PIECE($GET(YKEY),",",1)'="" SET LIEFERANT=$PIECE(YKEY,",",1) ; IF $GET(LIEFERANT)'="" DO ;KATALOGE DER LIEFERANTEN . NEW CATALOG,GROUP,GROUP1 . KILL ^INRAHMENGROUPLIEF(YM,LIEFERANT) . SET ^INRAHMENGROUPLIEF(YM,LIEFERANT,0,1)=$$^WWWTEXT(34143) ;default . SET CATALOG="" FOR SET CATALOG=$ORDER(^INLIEFCATGROUP(YM,LIEFERANT,CATALOG)) QUIT:CATALOG="" DO . . SET GROUP="" FOR SET GROUP=$ORDER(^INLIEFCATGROUP(YM,LIEFERANT,CATALOG,GROUP)) QUIT:GROUP="" DO . . . SET GROUP1=$GET(^INLIEFCATGROUP(YM,LIEFERANT,CATALOG,GROUP,1)) . . . QUIT:$PIECE(GROUP1,Y,1)="" . . . ;SET ^INRAHMENGROUPLIEF(YM,LIEFERANT,$PIECE(GROUP1,Y,1),1)=$P(GROUP1,Y,1) . . . SET ^INRAHMENGROUPLIEF(YM,LIEFERANT,GROUP,1)=$PIECE(GROUP1,Y,1) ;TYBD;3,1,2004 . . . QUIT . . QUIT . QUIT ; QUIT:$GET(YKEY)="" QUIT:$PIECE(YKEY,",",1)="" QUIT:$PIECE(YKEY,",",2)="" QUIT:$PIECE(YKEY,",",3)="" ; ; IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,7)="" SET $PIECE(^INRAHMENGROUP(YM,$PIECE(YKEY,",",1),$PIECE(YKEY,",",2),$PIECE(YKEY,",",3),1),Y,7)=$PIECE($GET(^INLIEF(YM,$PIECE(YKEY,",",1),1)),Y,56) ;KONDITION ; QUIT ;
